item.description:
I have a coupon for $2 off skate rental. Message me your email address if you'd like me to forward this to you. This means admission will cost $6 and the skate rental is $4 ($2 with coupon).

I will be at the corner of Dorrance and Washington, at the entrance of the Bank of America City Center. You can message me to get my cell number if you are unsure where this is.

If the group wants to, we can get a drink or food somewhere afterwards.

See you at one of the last Newcomers events before the new year!
item.name: Ice Skating in Kennedy Plaza
